facebook/lexical.summary: Recent activities in the facebook/lexical repository include a push event fixing a typo in README.md and a pull request event focused on the same documentation update, as well as another push event upgrading npm dependencies for the next version, highlighting ongoing maintenance and improvement efforts.

facebook/pyre-check.summary: The facebook/pyre-check repository has seen significant activity, including a push event containing multiple commits that enhance the project by dropping Never from unions, making improvements to lookup_name, allowing BoundMethod to match Callable, bumping tracing crates, and modeling control flow for try/except, showcasing active development and refinement of the project.

facebook/OpenBIC.summary: In the facebook/OpenBIC repository, a pull request event was initiated to modify CONFIG_MINIMAL_LIBC_MALLOC_ARENA_SIZE to 170k, accompanied by a successful build test, indicating focused updates aimed at optimizing performance.
